meta.title: From LOIS to LANE
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: It’s Superman week! Lois Lane is a journalist for the Daily Planet as well as the love interest for Superman. She’s played by Rachel Brosnahan (of “The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel” fame) in the current film. Brosnahan said she consulted with journalists to “get inside the head of a modern reporter." Not sure who she consulted about being in love with a superhero.
